EmailTemplate.name: Dream Case Rejection Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry,Your Dream has not been approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!DF_Case__c.Child_Firstname__c}{!DF_Case__c.Child_Last_Name__c},
After review from the chapter, I regret to inform you that {!DF_Case__c.Child_Firstname__c} {!DF_Case__c.Child_Last_Name__c} dream has not been approved. Our medical team has informed us that due to policies, {!DF_Case__c.Child_Firstname__c} {!DF_Case__c.Child_Last_Name__c}'s illness does not medically qualify for a wish to be granted.
We sincerely appreciate your support and for taking the time to inquire here at Dream Factory Brooklyn.
Best Regards,
Erin DiGiovanni Director of Dreams
